title: As a BOC Admin User, I want to edit the Club Player Pool Utility
custom_steps: WHEN users with the "ebis-widget-clubplayerpool-editor" role are viewing the Club Player Pools utility
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see an edit button
AND clicking Edit button will reload the form in edit mode
AND the only editable field will be the Replacement checkbox in the Alternate Training Site table
AND when the form is in edit mode, there will be a Save button
AND clicking Save will prompt the user to confirm their action
        -- If the user confirms, the form will be reloaded into edit mode and any changes will be committed
        -- If the user does not confirm, the modal will be dismissed and the user will be returned to the form in edit mode
AND There will also be a Cancel button when the form is in edit mode
AND Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm their action
        -- If the user confirms, the form will be reloaded into view mode and any changes will be dismissed
        -- If the user does not confirm, the modal will be dismissed and the user will be returned to the form in edit mode

title: PERMISSIONS: Club Player Pool Utility
custom_preconds: The following permission groups will be created:* ebis-widget-clubplayerpools-editor* ebis-widget-clubplayerpools-viewer*ebis-widget-clubplayerpools-editor* will be added to the following roles:*  ebis-proplayer-boc-admin-role*ebis-widget-clubplayerpools-viewer* will be added to the following roles:*  ebis-proplayer-boc-viewer-role*  ebis-proplayer-club-admin-role*  ebis-proplayer-club-viewer-role

title: As a User, I want to export the Club Player Pool to Excel
custom_steps: WHEN User is viewing the Club Player Pool Utility
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an export button on the Club Player Pool button
AND Clicking export will export all the players in the Pool to excel
AND ALL the columns will match the tables on the page
AND there will be a new PlayerID column added
AND there will be a new TYPE column added with the following options:
   -- Major League Active Roster
   -- Alternate Training Site
   -- 40-Man Players (Non-CLub Player Pool)
AND there will be an ORG column
AND players from all 3 tables will appear in one large unbroken list
AND There will be an arrow on the Excel button
* Clicking the arrow will reveal an Export All button
* Clicking Export All will Export the Player Pools for all Orgs to Excel
* Sort Order:
** Org
** Type
** Player Name

title: As a User, I want to Print the Club Players Pools page
custom_preconds: WHEN User is viewing the Club Players Pool page
custom_steps:
THEN there will be a PRINT button on the page
AND clicking Print button will print a PDF version of the pge
AND THE PDF will be in landscape view

title: As a User, I want to see the 40-Man Players (Non- Club Player Pool) portion of the Club Player Pools dashboard populated
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Club Player Pool utility
custom_expected:
THEN user will see 40-man players (non-club player pool)
AND the majority of columns should match the same values that appear on the MJ Roster widget
AND table is not editable
AND Player Population Logic (view ebis-arc story)

title: As a User, I want to see the Alternate Training Site portion of the Club Player Pools dashboard populated
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the Club Player Pool utility
custom_expected:
THEN the majority of the columns should match the same values that appear on the MJ ROster widget
AND the player population logic should display as : 10-Day IL, 7-Day Concussion IL, Optioned to Alternate Training Site, Minor League Player Transferred to Alternate Training Site, Rehab 60-Day-IL, Rehab COVID-IL, Rehab Restricted List
AND there will be one column that is editable: 
-- Replacement
AND this column will display a checkbox that is only editable by BOC

title: As a User, I want to see the MJ Active Roster portion of the Club Player Pools dashboard populated
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing the Club Player Pool utility
custom_expected:
THEN the majority of columns should match the same values that appear on the MJ Roster widget
AND player population logic should display "All Major League Active List Roster Status Players Only"
AND the table is not editable

title: As a User, I want to see a new Club Player Pools tab on the Rosters Dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing the Club Player Pool utility
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a new Club Player Pools tab on the Rosters Dashboard
AND clicking on this tab will load the Club Players Pools form page
AND the layout of the page will match the provided wire

title: As a User, I want a Flag to Identify Players included in a Club Player Pool
custom_steps: WHEN user wants to view a DB flag for players on the Clubs Player Pool
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a new DB flag that will be used to identify such players
AND the definition of players who count towards the Player Pool:
** (Total # of Active Roster Players + Total # of Alternate Training Site Players) - (Total # of 60-Day IL Rehab Players)
